LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealSurvivalPack.label: packaged survival cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealSurvivalPack.descriptio: A high-quality packaged cannibal meal, manufactured for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealSurvivalPack.label: packaged survival insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealSurvivalPack.description: A high-quality packaged insect meal, manufactured for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealSimple.label: simple cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealSimple.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from human meat.
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealSimple.label: simple insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealSimple.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from insect meat.
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealFine.label: fine cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from human meat and a variety of ingredients.
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealFine.label: fine insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from insect meat and a variety of ingredients.
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealLavish.label: lavish cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalMealLavish.description: A masterpiece of the cannibal culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealLavish.label: lavish insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_InsectMealLavish.description: A masterpiece of the insect culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalPemmican.label: cannibal pemmican
LanguageData.COAA_CannibalPemmican.description: A preserved mashed mixture of human fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.COAA_InsectPemmican.label: insect pemmican
LanguageData.COAA_InsectPemmican.description: A preserved mashed mixture of insect fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration. Great for traveling.
